actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the act of June 22, 1948 (62 Stat. 568, as amended, 16 U.S.C. 577h) to make additional funds available to carry out the provisions of said act.

summary.text: Provides that additional funds be made available under the Land and Water Conservation Act, to acquire additional public lands in northern Minnesota. (Amends 16 U.S.C. 577h)

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of June 22, 1948 (62 Stat. 568, as amended, 16 U.S.C. 577h) to make additional funds available to carry out the provisions of said act.
